FreeImage
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which FreeImage installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using FreeImage, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load FreeImage/3.18.0-GCCcore-12.2.0
```
